system.description:
Effect: The Weather is set to Smoggy for 5 rounds, and all valid targets gain @Affliction[blight] 8.

The user may spend up to 6 additional PP, increasing the Power of this attack by 15 per PP spent.

Requirement: User is a Dynamaxed Garbodor and has a Poison-Type attack on their Active List.

actions.name: G-Max Malodor
